mapper.select: select b_no as bno, title, theme, userid, nickname, hit, scrap, DATE_FORMAT(writedate, '%Y-%m-%d') writedate from homeboard
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homeboard( title, theme, userid, nickname, hit, scrap, thumbnail, hashtag, ip, writedate) values (#{title}, #{theme}, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{hit}, #{scrap}, #{thumbnail}, #{hashtag}, #{ip}, now())
